props.name: children
props.docblock: A string or an element that is rendered inside the main body of the `Toast`.

description.text: A string or an element that is rendered inside the main body of the `Toast`.

props.name: onClose
props.docblock:
A function that is called on close. It can be used to perform
actions upon closing of the `Toast`, such as setting the "show"
element to false.

description.text:
A function that is called on close. It can be used to perform
actions upon closing of the `Toast`, such as setting the "show"
element to false.

props.name: show
props.docblock: Boolean used to control whether the `Toast` shows

description.text: Boolean used to control whether the `Toast` shows

props.name: action
props.docblock:
Fields used to build optional action button.
`label` is a string rendered inside the button.
`href` is a link that will render the action button as an anchor tag.
`onClick` is a function that is called when the button is clicked.

description.text:
Fields used to build optional action button.
`label` is a string rendered inside the button.
`href` is a link that will render the action button as an anchor tag.
`onClick` is a function that is called when the button is clicked.

props.name: closeLabel
props.docblock: Alt text for the `Toast`'s dismiss button. Defaults to 'Close'.

description.text: Alt text for the `Toast`'s dismiss button. Defaults to 'Close'.

props.name: delay
props.docblock: Time in milliseconds for which the `Toast` will display.

description.text: Time in milliseconds for which the `Toast` will display.
